text.トレーナーさんの探す英雄が\r\n私だったなんて…運命的で、\r\n忘れられない: It was fate that I was the hero that \nthe trainer was looking for… It was \nan unforgettable episode.
text.私を見てくれる人がいる限り、\r\n英雄・ロブロイはくじけずに\r\nずっとずっ:
As long as there are people who look 
up to me, the heroic Rob Roy will 
continue to run, undeterred, for ever 
and ever…!
text.さまざまな一面に触れましたが、\r\nトレーナーさんは…\r\nやっぱりトレーナ: We touched on many aspects, but the \ntrainer… it's the trainer afterall.
text.おせちは神さまへのお供え物だった\r\nそうです。具材に込められた逸話を\r\n:
Osechi is said to have been an 
offering to the gods. It is more 
interesting to know the anecdote 
behind the ingredients.
text.ある本に登場するチョコが商品化\r\nしたんです。100の味があって…\r\nな: A chocolate from a book has been \ncommercialized… there are 100 \nflavors… so, um… no, that's it…
text.チョコレートドリンクは古代マヤ、\r\nアステカでも力を与えるものとされ\r\n: Chocolate drinks were considered \nempowering by the ancient Mayans \nand Aztecs, so… if you don't mind…
text.私が彦星なら、たとえ梅雨空でも\r\n織姫に会いに行きます。英雄が\r\n姫を悲:
If I were Hikoboshi, I would go to see 
Orihime even in the rainy season. 
I wouldn't want the hero to make the 
princess sad.
text.お菓子をくれなきゃいたずら…は\r\n気が引けますので、代わりに本を\r\n読み: If you don't give me sweets I will… \nI can't do it, can't I just read book for \nthem instead?
text.ある男性の善行が、やがて\r\nサンタクロースという存在を\r\n生み出した…素: A man's good deeds eventually gave \nbirth to the existence of Santa Claus \n… It's a wonderful story isn't it.
text.あの…もし嫌でなければ贈り物を…\r\n健康で幸せに過ごせると言われる\r\nヤ: Um… if you don't mind, I have a gift \nfor you… a mistletoe brooch that is \nsaid to keep you healthy and happy!
text.大晦日の風習は国ごとに違って、\r\n鐘で煩悩を払う国もあれば\r\n願い事をす:
The custom of New Year's Eve differs 
from country to country. In some 
countries, people use a bell to drive 
away their worries, while in others, 
they make a wish.
text.お誕生日おめでとうございます…！\r\nその、今日にちなんだ詩集が\r\nあった: Happy Birthday! I found a book of \npoems about today, if you don't mind.
text.『私の大切な読者さん。あなたの\r\n特別な日に大いなる祝福を』\r\n…な、な: 『My dearest reader, I wish you a big \nblessing on your special day. 』 \n… oh my! Was I exaggerating?
text.お祝い、ありがとうございます…！\r\nいつか…この日から英雄ロブロイの\r\n:
Thank you for the celebration…! 
Someday… I would like it to be said 
that the legend of our hero Rob Roy 
began on this day.
text.『ロブ・ロイ』をイメージしたお酒\r\nがあって…。お、大人になったら\r\n一: There is a sake based on "Rob Roy"… \nOh, when I grow up, will you have a \ndrink with me…!
text.お便りが届いていますね。\r\n今回はどんな内容でしょう？: You have received a letter. \nWhat is the content this time?
text.贈り物が届いたみたいです。\r\n物語の始まりを告げるような\r\n素敵なものか: It looks like a gift has arrived. \nMaybe it's something nice, like the \nbeginning of a story.
text.ミッションクリアですね！\r\n試練を乗り越え、成長する…\r\nこれからも前進: Mission accomplished! Overcoming \ntrials and growing… We can only \ncontinue to move forward.
text.もうすぐイベントですね。\r\nどんな物語が紡がれ、\r\nどんな英雄が生まれる: The event is almost here. What \nstories will be spun, what heroes will \nbe born?
text.イベント、見に行きませんか？\r\n胸躍るエピソードに出会える…\r\nそんな予:
Why don't you go see the event? 
I have a feeling we're in for some 
exciting episodes… I just have a 
feeling!
text.はぁ、ふぅ…すみません。\r\n読書だけではなく、ちゃんと体も\r\n鍛えている: Huh, phew… sorry. I'm not only \nreading, but I'm also working out…
text.ううっ、もう体力が…\r\n英雄になるには、\r\nもっと鍛えないといけませんね: Ugh, I'm so weak… I need to work \nout more to be a hero.
text.どのトレーニングをしますか！？\r\n今日は新しい私に出会える…\r\nそんな予: Which training do you want to do! \nI have a feeling that today you I \nmeet the new me… I have a feeling!
text.最近、お気に入りの作家さんが\r\n新刊の執筆にすごく懸命になられて\r\nいて: Lately, some of my favorite authors \nhave been working very hard on their \nnew books… and I can't lose!
text.トレーニングの1つ1つが\r\n物語を彩るエピソード…\r\nそう思うと、楽しく:
Each training session is an episode 
that adds to the story… and that 
makes it all the more fun to think 
about!
text.な、なんとなく、ですけど…\r\n今日は、いつもより立派な私を\r\nお見せでき: I don't know… but I feel like I can \nshow you a more splendid me today…!
text.目標が高いほど、\r\n日々の努力は欠かせません。\r\n英雄になるため、頑張り: The higher your goals, the more you \nhave to work hard every day. I will do \nmy best to be a hero…!
text.トレーニング開始ですね。\r\n教則本で読んだとおりに\r\nやってみます…！: Training has begun, hasn't it? \nI'll try to do exactly what I read in \nthe instructional books…!
text.はぁ…“ロブ・ロイ”も\r\nこんなふうに調子の出なかった時が\r\nあったんで: I wonder if Rob Roy was ever this out \nof shape…?
text.頑張らなきゃって思うのに、\r\n胸のあたりがずっと重くて…。\r\nやっぱりま: I feel like I have to do my best, \nbut my heart is still heavy… \nI guess I'm still immature…
text.もっと前向きにならないと…。\r\nうう…本を読んで持ち直したと\r\n思ったん: I need to be more positive… Ugh… \nI thought I got back on track after \nreading the book…
text.頑張らなきゃいけない場面…\r\n英雄は、立ち止まったり\r\nしないはずなのに: A scene where you have to work \nhard… heroes aren't supposed to \nstand still.
text.あの…少し休みを挟んだほうが…。\r\n戦記物でも、無理をおして\r\n劣勢にな:
Um… maybe we should take a break. 
… Even in war stories, there are 
many cases where overdoing it will 
lead to worse situation.
text.英雄の道も1歩から、ですが…\r\n1歩も動けなくなっては\r\n本末転倒と言い:
The path of a hero starts with a single 
step, but if you can't move even one 
step, it's like putting the cart before 
the horse…
text.ゼンノロブロイの英雄譚――\r\n語り継がれる伝説を\r\nこのレースで作ってみ: I will make this race a legend that will \nbe passed down from generation to \ngeneration…!
text.トレーナーさん…私の読者さん。\r\n英雄に至る物語を\r\nどうか見届けてくだ: Trainers… my readers. Please \nwitness my tale of heroism…!
text.勝つためのストーリーなら、\r\n頭の中に描けています。\r\nあとはそれをなぞ: I have the winning story in my head. \nAll I have to do is trace it…!
text.レースに勝てばきっと、\r\n憧れに1歩近づけますよね。\r\n…よ、よしっ、や: If I win this race, I'll be one step \ncloser to my dream. I'll do it… \nyes, I'll do it…!
text.いつもより視界がクリアというか…\r\nみなさんの動きがよく見えます。\r\nレ:
My vision is clearer than usual… 
I can see everyone's movements 
better. If only I could put this to 
good use in the race…!
text.“ロブ・ロイ”のように…とは\r\nいかないかもしれませんが、\r\n精いっぱい: I may not be Rob Roy, but I'll be \nrunning as hard as I can…!
text.どんな状況になっても\r\n諦めず、食らいついて…\r\nなんとか結果を残したい: No matter what the situation, \nI will not give up, I will persevere… \nI'm going to produce result.
text.レース前はドキドキしますね…。\r\nけど、いつも通りの\r\n走りができると思: I am very nervous before the race… \nBut I think I will be able to run as \nusual.
text.戦績を積み重ね、\r\nいつかは英雄と呼ばれるように…\r\n行ってきますね、ト: I'm off to keep up my record and one \nday be called a hero… I'll see you \nsoon, trainer.
text.不安は残りますけど…今まで\r\n精いっぱいやってきましたから。\r\nやれるだ: I'm still anxious, but… I've done my \nbest until now. I'm going to give it \neverything I can…!
text.ほ、本を読んで心を落ち着かせれば\r\nきっとなんとかなるはずです…。\r\nた: Fuuu, if you read a book and calm \nyour mind, I am sure it will work out… \nMaybe…
text.あれ？レンズにくもりが…。\r\nううっ、レース前なのに、\r\n晴れない気分で: Huh? There's a smudge on the lens… \nUgh, I'm not feeling good even \nthough it's before the race…
text.たとえ調子が悪くても…最後まで\r\n走ってみせます。どんな結果でも、\r\nそ:
Even if I am not in good shape… 
I will run until the end. No matter 
what the outcome, it will lead to the 
future.
text.私の競う相手は、\r\nこんなにも強大で…\r\nううん、それでも戦わないと…！: My competition is so powerful… \nNo, I still have to fight…!
text.気持ちまで逃げたらダメ…\r\nこれだと端役にもなれない…！\r\n…のは、わか: You can't run away from your feelings \n… You can't even play a minor role in \nthis…! I know that… but…
text.頂まで、あと1歩…！: One step closer to the top…!
text.次こそ、壁を乗り越えて…！: Next time, get over the wall…!
text.脇役で終わりたくない…！: I don't want to end up playing a minor \nrole…!
text.聴いてください…私の奏でる物語。: Listen to the story… the story I play.
text.あわわ…！私は英雄、私は英雄…っ！: Awawa…! I'm a hero, I'm a hero…!
text.あなたが見つけた英雄の…\r\nゼンノロブロイの英雄譚を\r\nどうか見守ってい: The heroic tales you found… \nThe heroic tales of Zenno Rob Roy \nplease watch over them…
text.朝読書なら、短編集がおすすめ\r\nです！その日の気分に合わせて、\r\n手軽に: For morning reading, I recommend \nshort stories! You can easily enjoy a \nstory that fits your mood.
text.眠気って、妖精が運んでくるという\r\n伝承があるんですよ？トレーナー\r\nさ:
There is a legend that sleepiness is 
brought to us by fairies. Maybe 
they're on your trainer's shoulders 
right now♪
text.体づくりも英雄には必要ですけど…\r\nみんなと同じ量の昼食は\r\n私にはちょ:
I know that physical exercise is 
necessary for heroes, but… having 
the same amount of lunch as 
everyone else might be a bit much 
for me…
text.物語の山場で昼休みが終わると、\r\n本の続きが気になって…午後の授業\r\nが:
When the lunch break ends at the 
climax of the story, I find myself 
wondering about the rest of the book 
… and the afternoon classes seem 
like an ordeal…!
text.夜のお供に物語はいかがですか？\r\n眠る前にスッキリできる\r\n大団円な本が:
How about a story to accompany you 
at night? There's a great roundup of 
books that will refresh you before you 
go to sleep…!
text.妖精や精霊は好きですけど、\r\nおばけは…ちょっと…\r\nいえ、かなり…遠慮: I like fairies and spirits, but ghosts… \nthat's a bit… no, not really… \nI'd rather not…
text.花粉症、トレーナーさんは\r\n平気ですか？花粉対策の眼鏡なら\r\nいつでも紹: Are you suffering from hay fever, \ntrainer? I can introduce you to \nanti-pollen glasses.
text.夏休みに行きたいところ…？\r\nそれならイギリスです。数多くの\r\n伝承の舞:
Where would you like to go for your 
summer vacation…? Then England is 
the place to go. I'd love to see 
firsthand the many folklore stages!
text.読書の秋がやってきましたね！\r\nおすすめの本ならたくさんあるので\r\nいつ:
Well, the reading season is upon 
us! I have plenty of book 
recommendations, so give me a 
shout anytime…!
text.しんしんと雪が降る中、暖炉の脇で\r\n薪の音色に耳を傾け、本を読む…\r\nそ:
I long to sit by the fireplace, listening 
to the sound of wood and reading 
a book while it snows…… 
I admire that kind of thing… ♪
text.カフェさんはすごいんですよ…！\r\n本の内容を伝えると、それに合った\r\nコ: Cafe-san is amazing…! I tell them \nwhat the book is about and they tell \nme the coffee that goes with it!
text.多くを語らず、力で示す――\r\nクリスエスさんは私の憧れで…\r\nつい目で追: Speak little and show with power \nI admire Kris S-san… I can't help but \nfollow her with my eyes…
text.星の本を紹介してから、アヤベさん\r\nと話す機会が増えたんです。\r\n…本当:
I've had more opportunities to talk 
with Ayabe-san since I introduced 
her to my book on stars. …She really 
like star doesn't she?
text.落ち込んだ時も、スイープさんと\r\n話していると元気になれるんです。\r\nと: Even when I'm down, talking to \nSweep-san makes me feel better. \nIt's very strong… the magic of a smile.
text.ライスさんは、とても温かくて\r\n優しい絵を描くんですよ。描き手\r\nそっく: Rice-san paints very warm and gentle \npictures. I love her drawings.
text.人前で歌うのは恥ずかしい反面、\r\n英雄として称えられているような\r\n感覚:
It is embarrassing to sing in front of 
people, but at the same time, I feel as 
if I am being honored as a hero, 
which is a complicated feeling…
text.物語調の歌は…少し得意なんです。\r\n吟遊詩人が思い浮かんで、上手く\r\n気: I'm a little better at storytelling songs \n. I think of minstrelsy, and I feel like I \ncan get into the spirit of it.
text.この勝負服は、“ロブ・ロイ”を\r\n模した最強の衣装なんです…！\r\n威厳や: This is the most powerful outfit I've \never seen, modeled after Rob Roy's…! \nDignity and style… I hope it shows.
text.勝負服を着ていると、憧れの英雄に\r\n近づけた気がして…どんなレースも\r\n:
When I wear the winning uniform, 
I feel like I'm getting closer to the 
hero I've always wanted to be… and 
I know I'll be fine no matter what the 
race is…!
text.早起き…？たしかに余裕をもって\r\n登校していますね。そうすればほら\r\n始:
Early riser…? Yes, you are right, I 
arrive at school with plenty of time to 
spare. That way, I can enjoy reading 
before school starts♪
text.昼の食堂は混雑していて…うっかり\r\n転ぶことが多いんです。あまり\r\n気づ:
The cafeteria is crowded at lunchtime 
… I often fall down by accident. It's a 
good thing they don't notice me too 
much…
text.夜更かしをすると、ライスさんが\r\nとても心配そうな顔をなさるので…\r\n夜: Rice-san looks very worried when I \nstay up late… I have to read in \nmoderation at night.
text.入学式の日…影が薄くて、案内の\r\n先輩に気づかれなかったんです…。\r\n今:
On the day of the entrance ceremony 
… I was so overshadowed that the 
guidance seniors didn't notice me… 
Now… I hope it won't happen again.
text.うう…眼鏡形に日焼けしちゃう\r\nなんて…しばらくは絶対、どんな\r\n場面で:
Ugh… I can't believe I got sunburned 
in the shape of glasses… I'll never 
take off my glasses for a while, no 
matter what…!
text.気温は涼しく、湿気もない…\r\n私にとっても本にとっても、\r\n秋は快適な季: Cooler temperatures, no humidity… \nfall is a comfortable season for me \nand for my books.
text.『雪の女王』はご存じですか？\r\n勇敢で諦めない心を持つゲルダは、\r\n大好:
Do you know "The Snow Queen"? 
Gerda is one of my favorite 
protagonists because of her bravery 
and never-give-up spirit.
text.英雄目指して、\r\n今日も前進です…っ！: We are moving forward today, \naiming to be heroes…!
text.トレーニングはいわば修行…\r\n名だたる勇士たちも、こうして\r\n努力を積み: Training is a discipline, so to speak… \nFamous warriors have also worked \nhard in this way, haven't they?
text.はいっ。図書委員の仕事は\r\n終わらせてきたので、\r\nいつでもはじめられま: Yes, I've finished my work as a \nmember of the library committee. \nso we can start anytime…!
text.変わりたい…だから、\r\nどんなトレーニングも\r\nやってみなきゃ…！: I want to change… so I have to try \nany kind of training…!
text.環境の変化がお話の転機になること\r\nって結構多いんですよね。\r\n私も成長:
I think it is quite common for a 
change in environment to be a 
turning point in a story. I hope I can 
grow too…
text.トレーナーさんも認めるとおり、\r\n諦めの悪さは人一倍ですから。\r\nとこと: Trainer migh have notice, I'm bad at \ngiving up compared to the other. \nI want to struggle as hard as I can…!
text.どんなメニューもこなせるように\r\nならなきゃ…読者さんにカッコ悪い\r\nと: I need to be able to handle any menu… I don't want to look uncool to my \nreaders.
text.今、この時も私の英雄譚の一編で、\r\n大切な時間です。共に物語を\r\nつづっ: This moment is a part of my heroic \ntale, and I cherish it. Please continue \nthe story with me…!
text.あなたの名は英雄譚に刻まれ、\r\n英雄と共に語り継がれることでしょう。: Your name will be etched in tales of \nheroism and passed down with the \nheroes.
text.これが…\r\n2人で作り上げた物語なんですね。: So this is… this is the story that the \ntwo of us created together.
text.少しは“ロブ・ロイ”に近づけたでしょうか？: Have I come a little closer to \n"Rob Roy"?
text.これが私の可能性――\r\n栄光への道しるべ…！: This is my potential - \nmy path to glory…!
text.ゼンノロブロイ、\r\nみ、未来の英雄です…！: Zeno Rob Roy, \nthe hero of the future…!
text.私の軌跡――英雄に至る道を\r\nどうか、見届けてください…！: Please witness my path to heroism…!
text.私だって…英雄に！\r\n信じて進めば…いつかきっと…！: I can be a hero, too! If I keep going, \nif I keep believing… then one day…!
text.い、今ここに、\r\n伝説は刻まれました…っ！: Here and now, \nthe legend is written…!
text.めでたしめでたしです。\r\n…えへっ。: I'm so happy for you. …Heh heh.
text.あの、\r\nログインボーナスはこちらです。: Um, here are the login bonuses.
text.明日はこちらが\r\n贈られるみたいですね。: Looks like this one will be given away \ntomorrow.
text.どんなトレーニングをしますか？\r\nメニューに合った本を\r\n持ってきますね: What kind of training do you do? I'll \nbring you a book that fits your menu.
text.学園にまつわる英雄譚を\r\nお探しですか？\r\nどれもすごく魅力的ですよ！: Are you looking for a heroic tale \naround school ? They're all so \nfascinating!
text.出走の登録ですね。\r\nふふっ、今度はどんなエピソードが\r\n生まれるんだろ: I see that you have registered for the \nrace. I wonder what kind of episodes \nwill be born this time…?
text.名鑑レベルが上昇しました。\r\nトレーナーさんの英雄譚も\r\n着々と刻まれて: The level of the name book has \nincreased. The trainer's tale of \nheroism is steadily being etched…!
text.物語の主人公に、私もなれますか？: Can I be the hero of the story?
text.ええと、応援を学ぶ本は…。: Let's see, a book about learning to \ncheer…
text.もっと力になりたい…です！: I wish I could help more…!
text.力があふれて…！\r\n私じゃないみたい…。: Power overflows…! \nIt's like it's not me…
text.可愛い英雄をお迎えできましたね。: You have a lovely hero on your hands.
text.次は成功します…！\r\nそれが物語のセオリーです！: Next time I will succeed…! \nThat's the theory of the story!
text.先の展開が楽しみです…！: Can't wait to see what happens next…!
text.私も、多くの英雄を生んだ学園の\r\nいち生徒なんですよね…。: I am also a student of the school that \ngave birth to many heroes…
text.着られている、なんて言われないように\r\n頑張らないと…！: I have to work hard not to be told \nI'm being worn…!
text.こんな素敵な服、着慣れていなくて…。\r\n似合いますか…？: I'm not used to wearing such nice \nclothes… Do I look good…?
text.詞に込められた物語を音に乗せる…\r\n歌うことは…結構好きなんです。: Song with a story on the lyric… \nI quite like singing it.
text.本の挿絵のような勝負服を着られて…\r\n今でも夢みたいです。: To be able to wear a winning outfit \nlike the illustrations in the book… \nI still dream about it.
text.これが英雄・ゼンノロブロイの姿です！\r\nって胸を張って言えるようにならなきゃ: This is the hero, Zenno Rob Roy! \nI have to be able to say with pride.
text.ど、どうでしょうか？\r\n変じゃないですか？: What do you think? \nIt's not weird right?
text.この服にも…\r\n素敵な物語が存在するんでしょうね。: I'm sure there is a wonderful story \nbehind these clothes as well…
text.お疲れ様でした。: Thank you for your hard work.
text.生徒全員が参加するパーティー…\r\n仮装したみなさんが一堂に会する\r\nさま: A party for all the students… It must \nbe so glamorous to see all of you \ndressed up in costumes…!
text.み…見てなさいっ！\r\n最上級の魔法をかけるんだからっ！: Watch me! \nI'm going to cast the finest magic!
text.これはきっと読者への隠された\r\n挑戦状…。気づいているのが\r\n私だけだっ: This is surely a hidden challenge to \nthe readers… What should I do if \nI am the only one who has noticed…!
text.『夢の石』へのお願い事…。\r\nそうだ！…次の村人たちも、\r\n素敵な旅がで: A request to the "Stone of Dreams"… \nYes! May the next villagers have a \nwonderful trip…!
text.イベントミッションはこちら\r\nです！こ、攻略本ですか…？\r\n図書室にあっ: The event mission is here! Is this a \nstrategy book…? \nWas it in the library…?
text.取り忘れはありませんか？\r\n目立たないものでも、\r\n忘れずに…！: Did you forget to pick it up? Even if \nit's not obvious, don't forget…!
